name: Insanity (Xenon)
description:
The only thing you have to fight is your sanity.
You are slowly going insane. 
More and more monsters appear and it is harder to make it through.
Can you make it? Or will this game drive you Insane?

Controls :

KEYBOARD (RECOMENDED)
WSAD - movement
Arrow Keys - attack

GAMEPAD
Right Stick - movement
Left Stick - attack
Right Bumper (RB) - attack down

Game was made for BlackThornProd 3rd Game Jam
The theme was : Less is More
Your character is slowling losing sanity and going insane.
You will have to face more and more problems that may appear on your way.

Game made in Unity , made by Xenon
YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/c/Xenonqq
